info.description:
===
CDS
===

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/CERNDocumentServer/cds-videos.svg?branch=cdslabs
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/CERNDocumentServer/cds-videos

.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/CERNDocumentServer/cds-videos/badge.svg?branch=cdslabs&service=github
    :target: https://coveralls.io/github/CERNDocumentServer/cds-videos?branch=cdslabs

This is the CERN Document Server source code overlay.

Powered by Invenio
===================
CDS is a small layer on top of `Invenio <http://invenio-software.org>`, a ​free software suite enabling you to run your own ​digital library or document repository on the web.

Installation
============
See INSTALL.rst

Testing
=======
Running the tests are as simple as: ::

    python setup.py test

or (to also show test coverage) ::

    source run-tests.sh

Changes
=======

Version 1.0.1 (2018-05-14)

- deposit:
  - remove SSE related code completely.
  - fixed deposit video player.
- records:
  - download box reorganization.
  - added no index for robots for projects.
  - added "Press" field until general community solution is put in place.
- security:
  - fixed file ACL check.
  - filter videos inside project according to current user provides.

(No release information until 2018-04-11)

Version 1.0.0 (2017-12-14)

- Initial release
info.name: CDS
info.summary: Access articles, reports and multimedia content in HEP
info.html_description:
This is the CERN Document Server source code overlay.

Powered by Invenio

CDS is a small layer on top of Invenio <http://invenio-software.org>, a ​free software suite enabling you to run your own ​digital library or document repository on the web.

Installation

See INSTALL.rst

Testing

Running the tests are as simple as:

python setup.py test

or (to also show test coverage)

source run-tests.sh

License

Copyright (C) 2013-2016 CERN.

Changes

Version 1.0.1 (2018-05-14)

  • deposit: - remove SSE related code completely. - fixed deposit video player.
  • records: - download box reorganization. - added no index for robots for projects. - added “Press” field until general community solution is put in place.
  • security: - fixed file ACL check. - filter videos inside project according to current user provides.

(No release information until 2018-04-11)

Version 1.0.0 (2017-12-14)

  • Initial release
